page.title: 08LEISURE AND RECREATION-1
page.content: {Condover Players-}stage a musical show and a play annually.The show provides money to pay for maintaining the village hall,a registered charity.So the players do not pay a hire charge. The players come from within 3 miles of the village.They do not usually write their own material or repeat a show but they do make the scenery and most of their costumes.During the performance a meal is served to the audience and there is a bar, so consequently many more villagers are involved than just the cast.Two pianists share the music and provide some percussion.There are 5 performances for each show and tickets vary in price according to the day. Condover Hall and primary school pupils attend the dress rehearsals free.
